message:
Eta reduction proposed. It's recommended to rewrite 'fun acc ->
                                                       fun k -> remove acc k' as 
'remove'

Match is redundant. It's recommended to rewrite it as 'if shadow
then ((TypeEnvironment.extend env name scheme), fresh)
else
  (let typ = TypeEnvironment.find_typ env name in
   (env, (Option.value typ ~default:fresh)))'
